description: Creates a client-add-in for Amazon Connect within a directory. You can create only one Amazon Connect client add-in within a directory. This client add-in allows WorkSpaces users to seamlessly connect to Amazon Connect.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The directory identifier for which to configure the client add-in.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the client add-in.

parameters.name: URL
parameters.description: The endpoint URL of the Amazon Connect client add-in.
